patthana23.25:4.1: Napītisahagataṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā pītisahagato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.25:5.1: Napītisahagataṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā pītisahagato akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.25:6.1: Napītisahagato naabyākato dhammo pītisahagatassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana23.25:6.3: Ārammaṇe aṭṭhavīsa, adhipatiyā anantare aṭṭhavīsa … pe … upanissaye aṭṭhavīsa, kamme catuvīsa, natthiyā vigate aṭṭhavīsa.
